verses.verse: שַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> Cast לַחְמְךָ֖ <WH3899> thy bread עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> upon הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> the waters כִּֽי־ <WH3588> after בְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> it after many הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> days תִּמְצָאֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH4672> for thou shalt find

תֶּן־ <WH5414> Give חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> a portion לְשִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> to seven וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> even לִשְׁמוֹנָ֑ה <WH8083> and also to eight כִּ֚י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תֵדַ֔ע <WH3045> for thou knowest מַה־ <WH4100> what יִּהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> may occur רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> not what evil עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> shall be upon the earth

אִם־ <WH518> If יִמָּלְא֨וּ <WH4390> be full הֶעָבִ֥ים <WH5645> If the clouds גֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <WH1653> of rain עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> [themselves] upon the earth יָרִ֔יקוּ <WH7324> they empty וְאִם־ <WH518> and whether יִפּ֥וֹל <WH5307> fall עֵ֛ץ <WH6086> and if the tree בַּדָּר֖וֹם <WH1864> toward the south וְאִ֣ם <WH518> If בַּצָּפ֑וֹן <WH6828> or toward the north מְק֛וֹם <WH4725> in the place שֶׁיִּפּ֥וֹל <WH5307> falleth הָעֵ֖ץ <WH6086> where the tree שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there יְהֽוּא׃ <WH1933> there it shall be

שֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> He that observeth ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> the wind לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יִזְרָ֑ע <WH2232> shall not sow וְרֹאֶ֥ה <WH7200> and he that regardeth בֶעָבִ֖ים <WH5645> the clouds לֹ֥א <WH3808> will not יִקְצֽוֹר׃ <WH7114> shall not reap

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who אֵֽינְךָ֤ <WH369> not יוֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <WH3045> As thou knowest מַה־ <WH4100> how long דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> not what [is] the way הָר֔וּחַ <WH7307> of the spirit כַּעֲצָמִ֖ים <WH6106> [nor] how the bones בְּבֶ֣טֶן <WH990> [do grow] in the womb הַמְּלֵאָ֑ה <WH4392> of her that is with child כָּ֗כָה <WH3602> so לֹ֤א <WH3808> not תֵדַע֙ <WH3045> even so thou knowest אֶת־ <WH853> מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> not the works הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> who maketh אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> all

בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> In the morning זְרַ֣ע <WH2232> sow אֶת־ <WH853> זַרְעֶ֔ךָ <WH2233> thy seed וְלָעֶ֖רֶב <WH6153> and in the evening אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּנַּ֣ח <WH3240> withhold יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> not thine hand כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אֵֽינְךָ֨ <WH369> for יוֹדֵ֜ע <WH3045> for thou knowest אֵ֣י <WH335> not whether זֶ֤ה <WH2088> morning יִכְשָׁר֙ <WH3787> shall prosper הֲזֶ֣ה <WH2088> morning אוֹ־ <WH176> or זֶ֔ה <WH2088> morning וְאִם־ <WH518> whether שְׁנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH8147> either this or that or whether they both כְּאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> [shall be] alike טוֹבִֽים׃ <WH2896> good

וּמָת֖וֹק <WH4966> [is] sweet הָא֑וֹר <WH216> Truly the light וְט֥וֹב <WH2896> and a pleasant לַֽעֵינַ֖יִם <WH5869> [thing it is] for the eyes לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> to behold אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> the sun

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Indeed אִם־ <WH518> if שָׁנִ֥ים <WH8141> years הַרְבֵּ֛ה <WH7235> many יִחְיֶ֥ה <WH2421> live הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> But if a man בְּכֻלָּ֣ם <WH3605> all יִשְׂמָ֑ח <WH8055> [and] rejoice וְיִזְכֹּר֙ <WH2142> in them all yet let him remember אֶת־ <WH853> יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> the days הַחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> of darkness כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed הַרְבֵּ֥ה <WH7235> for they shall be many יִהְי֖וּ <WH1961> become כָּל־ <WH3605> Everything שֶׁבָּ֥א <WH935> All that cometh הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> [is] vanity

שְׂמַ֧ח <WH8055> Rejoice בָּח֣וּר <WH970> O young man בְּיַלְדוּתֶ֗יךָ <WH3208> in thy youth וִֽיטִֽיבְךָ֤ <WH3190> be pleasant לִבְּךָ֙ <WH3820> and let thy heart בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> thee in the days בְחוּרוֹתֶ֔ךָ <WH979> of thy youth וְהַלֵּךְ֙ <WH1980> and walk בְּדַרְכֵ֣י <WH1870> in the ways לִבְּךָ֔ <WH3820> of thine heart וּבְמַרְאֵ֖י <WH4758> and in the sight עֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> of thine eyes וְדָ֕ע <WH3045> but know כִּ֧י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> for all אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> these יְבִֽיאֲךָ֥ <WH935> will bring הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> thou that for all these [things] God בַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> thee into judgment

וְהָסֵ֥ר <WH5493> Therefore remove כַּ֙עַס֙ <WH3708> sorrow מִלִּבֶּ֔ךָ <WH3820> from thy heart וְהַעֲבֵ֥ר <WH5674> and put away רָעָ֖ה <WH7451> evil מִבְּשָׂרֶ֑ךָ <WH1320> from thy flesh כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because הַיַּלְד֥וּת <WH3208> for childhood וְהַֽשַּׁחֲר֖וּת <WH7839> and youth הָֽבֶל׃ <WH1892> [are] vanity
